Trade/Device Name(s): cobas Influenza A/B Nucleic acid test for use on the cobas Liat System
cobas Influenza A/B & RSV Nucleic acid test for use on the cobas Liat System
cobas Strep A Nucleic acid test for use on the cobas Liat System
Regulation Name(s): Respiratory Viral Panel Multiplex Nucleic Acid Assay
Group A Streptococcus Nucleic Acid Amplification Assay System
Real Time Nucleic Acid Amplification System
Method(s)/Technology(ies): Silica magnetic bead-based nucleic acid extraction
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for cobas Influenza A/B, cobas Influenza A/B & RSV, and cobas Strep A nucleic acid tests for detection of respiratory viruses and Strep A using real-time PCR on the cobas Liat System
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative detection and differentiation of Influenza A, Influenza B, and RSV RNA in nasopharyngeal swabs and detection of Streptococcus pyogenes in throat swabs, aiding in diagnosis of respiratory infection and pharyngitis, for professional use on the cobas Liat System
